description:
See http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/cs-devguide-latest.pdf page 11.

When someone is over limit, the response must include a RetryAfter header and something similar in the response body I think -- though that's not on page 11 of the devguide.

This bug does not include support for determining limits programmatically via GET /limits -- that's another bug.
title: Support rate limiting in API
